props.name: icon
props.shortDescription: Icon class to display

props.name: disabled
props.shortDescription: Disables the item (changes item opacity and mouse cursor)

classes.name: NgaActionComponent
classes.shortDescription: Action item, display a link with an icon, or any other content provided instead.

props.name: inverse
props.shortDescription: Makes colors inverse based on current theme

props.name: size
props.shortDescription: Size of the component, small|medium|large

classes.name: NgaActionsComponent
classes.shortDescription:
Shows a a horizontal list of actions, available in multiple sizes
Aligns items vertically.

classes.name: NgaCardBodyComponent
classes.shortDescription:
Component intended to be used within  the `<nga-card>` component.
It adds styles for a preset body section.

classes.name: NgaCardComponent
classes.description:
While this component can be used alone, it also provides a number
of child components for common card sections, including:
- nga-card-header
- nga-card-body
- nga-card-footer

classes.name: NgaCardFooterComponent
classes.shortDescription:
Component intended to be used within  the `<nga-card>` component.
It adds styles for a preset footer section.

classes.name: NgaCardHeaderComponent
classes.shortDescription:
Component intended to be used within  the `<nga-card>` component.
It adds styles for a preset header section.

classes.name: NgaLayoutColumnComponent
classes.shortDescription:
Component intended to be used within  the `<nga-layout>` component.
It adds styles for a preset column section.

classes.name: NgaLayoutComponent
classes.description:
While this component can be used alone, it also provides a number
of child components for common layout sections, including:
- nga-sidebar
- nga-layout-column
- nga-layout-content
- nga-layout-header
- nga-layout-footer

classes.name: NgaLayoutFooterComponent
classes.shortDescription:
Component intended to be used within  the `<nga-layout>` component.
It adds styles for a preset footer section.

classes.name: NgaLayoutHeaderComponent
classes.shortDescription:
Component intended to be used within  the `<nga-layout>` component.
It adds styles for a preset header section.

classes.name: NgaSearchFieldComponent
classes.shortDescription:
search-field-component is used under the hood by nga-search component
can't be used itself

examples.description: Example of fixed sidebar located on the left side, initially collapsed.
examples.code:
<nga-sidebar left fixed state="collapsed">
 <nga-sidebar-header>Header</nga-sidebar-header>
 <nga-sidebar-content>
   Menu or another component here
 </nga-sidebar-content>
 <nga-sidebar-footer>
   Footer components here
 </nga-sidebar-footer>
</nga-sidebar>

props.name: tag
props.shortDescription:
Tags a sidebar with some ID, can be later used in sidebar service
to determine which sidebar triggered the action, if multiple sidebars exist on the page.

props.name: fixed
props.shortDescription: Makes sidebar fixed (shown above the layout content)

props.name: left
props.shortDescription: Places sidebar on the right side

props.name: right
props.shortDescription: Places sidebar on the left side

props.name: state
props.shortDescription: Initial sidebar state, `expanded`|`collapsed`|`compacted`

methods.name: returnSomeValue
methods.shortDescription:
Returns some value
// TODO: remove this

methods.name: someTestMethod
methods.shortDescription:
Some Static method
// TODO: remove this

classes.name: NgaSidebarComponent
classes.description:
Sidebar can be place on the left or right side of the layout, can be fixed (shown above the content)
or can push the layout when opened.

classes.name: NgaSidebarContentComponent
classes.description: Placeholder which contains a sidebar main content.

classes.name: NgaSidebarFooterComponent
classes.description:
Placeholder which contains a sidebar footer content,
placed at the very bottom of the sidebar outside of the scroll area.

classes.name: NgaSidebarHeaderComponent
classes.description:
Placeholder which contains a sidebar header content,
placed at the very top of the sidebar outside of the scroll area.

classes.name: NgaSidebarService
classes.description: Root module service to control the sidebar from any part of the app.

props.name: color
props.shortDescription: Color of the area shown when no picture specified

props.name: menu
props.shortDescription: List of menu items for a user context menu (shown when clicked)

props.name: menuClick
props.shortDescription: Outputs when a context menu item is clicked

props.name: name
props.shortDescription: Specifies a name to be shown on the right of a user picture

props.name: picture
props.shortDescription:
Absolute path to a user picture
User name initials (JD for John Doe) will be shown if no picture specified

props.name: title
props.shortDescription: Specifies a title (written in a smaller font) to be shown under the **name**

props.name: inverse
props.shortDescription: Makes colors inverse based on current theme

props.name: onlyPicture
props.shortDescription: Whether to show only a picture or also show the name and title

props.name: showInitials
props.shortDescription: Whether to show a user initials (if no picture specified) or not

props.name: showName
props.shortDescription: Whether to show a user name or not

props.name: showTitle
props.shortDescription: Whether to show a user title or not

props.name: size
props.shortDescription: Size of the component, small|medium|large

classes.name: NgaUserComponent
classes.description: Can be used as a user profile link or can bring a user context menu.
classes.shortDescription: Represents a component showing a user avatar (picture) with a user name on the right.
